faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What are the perks of applying for an employment visa?
items.answer: Securing an employment visa can help you attract top talent, foster staff loyalty, fill skill gaps, and sponsor families.

items.question: What is the eligibility criteria for an employment visa?
items.answer: You can qualify for an employment visa by meeting specific education and experience requirements, demonstrating skills, and having a job offer from a qualified employer.

items.question: How long does it take to secure an employment visa in the UAE?
items.answer: It generally takes 7 to 14 working days to obtain a UAE employment visa. We help optimise processing times by eliminating unexpected delays, missing documents, and costly errors.

items.question: Can I apply for an employment visa if my employee is outside the UAE?
items.answer: Yes. You can initiate the visa application process regardless of where your employee currently resides. We assist you in compiling the necessary documents and paperwork to simplify the visa process.

items.question: Does One Nexuz assist with employment visa renewals or cancellations?
items.answer: Yes, our expert consultants help you navigate employment visa renewals and cancellations, enabling you to scale your team efficiently.
